biotools.summary: Based on the comparison of profile HMMs, HHpred takes a protein sequence or multiple sequence alignment as input and searches for remote homologues in an assortment of databases such as PDB, SMART and Pfam.  The user can select either a local or global alignment method, and the search results can be used to generate  3D structural models.

bioschemas.name: HHpred
